job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtDescriptionltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspThe Screenings Team aims to increase user safety reduce the frequency of property damage incidents and help maintain our brand ltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspWe perform background checks and other data searches to score a users riskltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbsp3 years of data science data analytics or business intelligence experienceltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspStrong understanding of SQLltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspExperience conducting data analysis in PythonltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspExperience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations ltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspAbility to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levelsltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspAbility to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insightsltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspBSBA in CS or related fieldltpgtltpgtltstronggtPreferred Qualifications ltstronggtltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspPrior experience at a major tech company andor in management consultingltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspFamiliarity with SupersetltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspFamiliarity with running weblab experiments efficacy studies or product validation testsltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspFamiliarity with machine learning basicsltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspFamiliarity with our infrastructure including Airflow Presto SQL and Hive SQLltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspExperience creating and maintaining data pipelinesltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspExperience supporting engineering product workltpgtltpgtoampnbspampnbspMSMA in CS or related fieldltpgt
